title: The Community Session
description:
Ready for some real talk with the key players of the developer community? Then you won’t want to miss this Community session! We’ve got a stellar line-up of community leaders who are eager to share their insights and experiences with you.


Here’s what you can expect:


An open discussion on why strong developer communities matter and what’s in it for you

A sneak peek into upcoming community initiatives and activities

Insights into how you can get involved and make a difference

A review of some of the community focussed actions from the Devoxx UK UnConference

A fun, fast-paced conversation with plenty of audience participation

No preaching - just real talk from people who are passionate about the developer community


This won't be a boring panel discussion. We’ll keep it lively, informal, and maybe even a little bit chaotic. So come join us and let’s have some fun while we learn from the best!
